name: VibriosisTestsForVibrionaceaeSpeciesExceptToxigenicVibrioCholeraO1AndO139NucleicAcid
title: Vibriosis (Tests for Vibrionaceae species [except Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139] Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting nucleic acid of Vibrionaceae species (except Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139)),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Vibrio species nucleic acid;  

LOINC search: “(vibrio or Grimontia or Photobacterium) nucleic -cholerae”),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINCs for Vibrio cholerae)
